Hi,

I am trying to model a reactor with solid state molecular diffusion. 
=
One of the state variables is the bulk atomic ratio of H to metal Pd 
(H/Pd=
 ratio). The rate of transition of H from surface to bulk depends 
on this =
state variable, which changes with time and space. 

The question: Is there=
 any way we can pass  a state variable to 
Cantera and get it to calculate =
using the latest conditions?

Thanks in advance for the help,
Atul Bhargav
=
Graduate Student
ME dept., Univ. of Maryland
College Park, MD 20740
